wikipedia_page.main: Colin Battye (1936 – April 2018) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s and 1960s. He played at club level for Castleford (Heritage № 427), as a wing.

response: * Colin Battye (1936–2018), rugby league footballer of the 1950s and 1960s
Malcolm Battye is the younger brother of Derek Battye, Barbara Battye, and the rugby league footballer; Colin Battye.
